property.name: greenThreshold
property.label: Green Threshold (Hours >)
property.description: Cases with more than this many hours left will be Green.

property.name: yellowThreshold
property.label: Yellow Threshold (Hours >)
property.description: Cases with more than this many hours left (but less than Green) will be Yellow.

property.name: orangeThreshold
property.label: Orange Threshold (Hours >)
property.description: Cases with more than this many hours left (but less than Yellow) will be Orange.

property.name: columnFields
property.label: Columns (FieldName:Width)
property.default: CaseNumber:100, RT_Remaining:150, AT_Remaining:150, UoW_Remaining:150, Fx_Remaining:150, Subject, Priority
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields. Format: FieldName:Width. Default width is 150 for SLA columns.
